explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the impact of microstructure factors on asset pricing in African stock markets, using statistical methods like generalized least squares and fixed effect models, as well as panel smooth transition regression (PSTR) modeling. There is no mention or use of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other AI-related methods in the abstract. The study is purely econometric and does not involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning or AI.
